bibl.title: Elegia In Coemeterio Rustico Scripta
Gray's Elegy in a country churchyard translated into Latin elegiac verse, by the Rev. William Hildyard

projectDesc.p: This e-text is part of the 'Gray's "Elegy" in translation'-section of the Thomas Gray Archive (TGA).
